EmailTemplate.description: Email communication sent to the original triage responsible and all previous approvers to inform that the case has been reviewed by the approver and he/she consider this case does not need to be escalated
EmailTemplate.name: 21 - Case Escalated - Rejected info to initial requestor
EmailTemplate.subject: A case for {!Case.Provider_Name_For_Email_Merge__c} has not been escalated
